mapper.select: SELECT count(DISTINCT hts.h_id) commitCount FROM homework_teacher_student hts WHERE hts.h_id = #{hId}
SELECT count(DISTINCT hs.s_id) shouldCount FROM homework_student hs WHERE hs.h_id=#{hId}

SELECT s.s_id sId, s.s_name sName, c.c_name cName, shc.commited_time commitTime, shc.student_homework_path path, shc.student_homework_name filename, hts.is_received isReceived, hts.id id FROM homework_teacher_student hts LEFT JOIN student s ON hts.s_id = s.s_id LEFT JOIN student_homework_commit shc ON hts.s_id = shc.s_id AND hts.h_id = shc.h_id LEFT JOIN class c ON s.s_class = c.c_id WHERE hts.t_id = #{tId} AND hts.h_id = #{hId}
